betterquesting:10.desc:8:
My campaign simply cannot continue as it is currently going. Something needs to change, I need to change. I saw a glimpse of what being a Fractallite really means, now I have to chase all other glimpses.
The Elder Ones, I must speak with one of them, known as the master of Horror.
I do not know what type of answers I will receive, but I must ask. I must fight to ask.
